name: Corrupted Mirror
description:
Made for the A2B2 Game Jam.

The Corruption has spread like wildfire, warping everything it touches into a contorted, ruinous form.

You must make the journey through what remains of the world to find the source of the Corruption and attempt to stop its continued spread.

To aid in your journey, you harness the power of the Mirror World, a reflection of the purity that once was.

A puzzle-platformer where you move between a corrupted and uncorrupted world to progress. Sometimes the corruption is an obstacle, but other times it provides a means to move forward.

Note: This game has very unpolished and haphazardly implemented mechanics, so expect wonky controls, glitches, potential softlocks, all of the good stuff.
